title: Davidvictorson
author: Davidvictorson
content: I read for this article1 say our inflation rate for we country don increase 21.91% for last month. Compared to January 2023 na like 0.09% wey e take increase na so  the Consumer Price Index (CPI) report by the National Bureau of Statistics (NBS) talk. Wetin make the inflation rate to increase like this na because of the lack of money and other uncertainties wey the new naira redesign and the presidential election carry come. The part wey this inflation touch pass na for food because food inflation come increase by 24.35%. This inflation come reduce wetin we fit buy . That is e affect our purchasing power. As e be now, we sit down dey look CBN's next Monetary Policy Committee meeting to see if anything go change. But, walaihi, CBN no give a damn about Nigerians, the inflation rate  or anythin at all, them just be tools wey politicians dey use do witchunt their fellow politicians. As dem talk, if too elephants fight na the grass dey suffer am. Una think say CBN fit do anything to reduce the inflation rate especially for food?1. https://nairametrics.com/2023/03/15/nigerias-inflation-rate-rises-further-to-21-91-in-february-2023/?amp=1

Our population don pass watin to call alarming, our production  dey low and this moneyatter now just push everything go up because, most people way dey into export and export, na money them dey use. The fact say, consumers dey buy there money to use and this money cef na watin this traders go still use go buy other people goods and to replenish there shop them na em be say, things gats cost pass as e be. Fuel kwa no make the matter better, e follow cast the whole thing. Na for election to pass first shah, we goanage as we dey manage before first first.When it comes to CBN, them don shred old currencies way enter there hands already and them no go fit go back to print old notes except new once. Make the circulation dey go on, things go normal.

comments.author: CryptopreneurBrainboss
comments.body: Quote from: Davidvictorson on March 15, 2023, 06:56:20 PMAs e be now, we sit down dey look CBN's next Monetary Policy Committee meeting to see if anything go change. But, walaihi, CBN no give a damn about Nigerians, the inflation rate  or anythin at all, them just be tools wey politicians dey use do witchunt their fellow politicians. As dem talk, if too elephants fight na the grass dey suffer am. Una think say CBN fit do anything to reduce the inflation rate especially for food?But you check am na, wetin the CBN wan do when some members of the government dey sabotage their plans. No be same APC governors carry CBN go court to bring back old naira and this wan mean say the supply of naira in circulation go come increase and two currency go come dey circulate at the same time. This can only devalue the naira more instead of adding value to it which goes against all the plans the CNB had to make the Naira strong again. This governors think say dem dey do good things but your post na a result of the decision they took. Th CBN are hopeless, na to just dolf hand the watch as the country dey go because nothing dem fit do at this point. I get questions oh, food inflation no fit happen because of lack of money na instead e dey happen because plenty money dey in circulation. Make person correct me if I dey get am wrong. Like people dey usually add price because they know say people fit afford am and commot price when money no dey. I think wetin dey contribute to the peak in food price na high transportation fee due to lack of petroleum and not the new money policy. Make we no forget fuel scarcity hit us the same time wey all this other things dey happen.
